/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of modern and traditional styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and the street. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various colors of the buildings.
